# Menu Item Movable
<!--
@name: Menu Item Movable
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/notimp.png" valign="center" alt="Not implemented" title="Not implemented" /></div>

Move individual menu options. This instruction may be implemented in a future version of AOZ.
## Parameters

- **level**: Level of the menu item
---
